pages.text: Villages are one of the most useful structures in the game. There, you can find Villagers to trade with as well as resources that can help you.

pages.title: Guards
pages.text: Guards defend the village. Turn an unemployed villager into a guard by crouch-interacting with a sword or crossbow on them.

pages.title: Traders
pages.text: You can trade with most villagers. Emeralds are used as the standard currency.

pages.title: Waystones
pages.text: Most villages have waystones which allow for fast travel. Find out more in the Waystones section.
